name: Secrets of the Temple
description:
You are a world-renowned treasure hunter seeking the ‘Eye of Ra’, a legendary diamond thought lost to the sands of time. The Eye is said to bring wealth and prosperity to any who possess it.

Brave the Winding Tunnels of an Expansive Complex
Navigate the shifting platforms, treacherous pitfalls, and fiendish traps left to guard the Eye in this ancient tomb.

Solve Long-Forgotten Puzzles
Pit your mind against the Pharaoh’s engineers and find ways of bypassing their locks and traps.

Unearth Ancient Foes
Fight for your life against the Pharaoh's undying chosen, sworn to guard the Eye long after the end of their natural lives.
